song_lyrics: Dhruv nā’yā Prah‍lād nā’yā, hete nā’yā Hanumān;
Prīt karī Parīkṣhit nāhyā, jogī Shukdev nā’y... 1
Sau sant maḷī dhāraṇ mānḍyu, gnān Gangā toḷāy;
Jap tap tīrath joḍe maḷiyā, emā sarva sādhan maḷī jāy... 2
Gnān-Gangāno mahimā moṭo, hete kahyo nav jāy;
Bhale maḷyā Mahetā Narasaiyāno, Swāmī hete hariguṇ gāy... 3
title: Jene gher harijan Harijash gāy

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-270: Narsinha Mehta

Category: Anya Gujarati Pad
